website_summaries.verdict: A versatile tool that can measure ABV for a variety of beverages including wine, beer, mead, and kombucha.
pros: An eco-conscious product made of recycled, nontoxic materials
The company puts a lot of effort into quality assurance before the product is even shipped
cons: Although versatile enough to work with numerous beverages, some say it's most accurate with beer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for kombucha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: First off I received the ABV Hydrometer with the Test Tube Jar. Very happy with the ease of use. Large numbers and easy to read, nice colors. Now I know that these are fragile and have always been careful when using it. So I contacted Brewing America, I explained to them my problem and they shipped one to me right away. Can't beat that with a stick. Would definitely buy from them again.

product_meta.title: Brewing Hydrometer Alcohol Tester Kit: American-made Beer & Wine Specific Gravity ABV Test Pro Series Traceable & Borosilicate Glass Test Tube Jar & Brush
product_meta.description:
Brewing America Triple Scale Hydrometer Kit:

1. NEW! American-made Triple Scale Hydrometer for Beer, Wine and Cider! No ridiculous colors to compare the readings against.
2. Tested with a focus group of brewers for homebrewers!
3. Triple Scale: Specific Gravity (0.990 - 1.170), Brix/Balling tool (0-35), Potential Alcohol (0%-22%).
4. No lead which means your product and the environment are safe with this gravity reader. The brewing hydrometer is made of safe stainless steel balls in the bottom.

Brewing America Glass Hydrometer Test Jar Tube:

1. Redesigned to use less wort or must (about half) by brewers.
2. Strong, extra thick borosilicate ( boro 3.3 ) glass with a protection ring.
3. It is tall enough to get the best readings and measure your ABV.
4. Clear glass to read from the outside of the jar when you are measuring.

Brewing America Stainless Steel Hydrometer Test Jar Cleaning Brush:

1. Custom designed to work perfectly with the Brewing America Hydrometer Test Jar Beaker.
2. Thicker handle and thicker bristles to last a lifetime.
